alert.note: Alert for Wise (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 11 at 9:15PM EST until March 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches with up to 10 inches possible across the highest elevations of the Smoky Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Far east Tennessee Mountains. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow and ice covered roadways with slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some blowing and drifting of the snow is possible with greatly reduced visibilities at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
